overview: From the creators of Gob-A-Goo comes more found footage detailing the abduction of Matthew to the vast wasteland of the Great Salt Lake. Fascinating footage outside of his downtown stinky adobe...this film hits the road in all it's disturbing glory. Highlights include Matthew's hilarious reaction to the hour long annoying tape loop prepared just for his honor and getting the privilege of ordering food for everyone at the local McDonald's drive thru.
title: Salt Air Abduction
